key_risks: Workforce reductions and employee morale issues
Intense competition from Microsoft Dynamics 365, Oracle, and SAP
High costs and complexity of Salesforce solutions
Legal and financial settlements, including excessive 401(k) fees
controversies: Layoffs of 10% of the workforce in 2023
Integration challenges with Slack and Tableau acquisitions
Patent infringement disputes with competitors like Microsoft
environmental_issues: Commitment to achieving net-zero emissions and Sustainability Cloud initiatives
social_issues: Employee morale and performance pressure following layoffs
Concerns about customer retention due to pricing and complexity
governance_issues: Settlements related to excessive 401(k) fees raising governance concerns
